Welcome! I'm Sandro, a third-year CE student at the University of Michigan. Throughout my life, I've been deeply enthralled by the boundless potential of my field. Mechatronics, especially in the robotics context, is my main passion— although I enjoy writing software as well. Feel free to explore my digital resume to learn a bit more about me!
